Title: Learn from the good cadre comrade Men He who is infinitely loyal to Chairman Mao's revolutionary line
Designer: Shanghai New Academy of Art (上海新画院供稿)
Publisher: Shanghai geming jiaoyu chubanshe (上海革命教育出版社)
Notes: From (incomplete) series on the martyr Men He, in the center of this image, raising his right arm.The text on the red flag:人民公社好 - The People's Commune is good中国人民解放軍駐青海省部队 - Chinese People's Liberation Army Troops in Qinghai Province
